## CRAN

* [casino](https://github.com/anthonypileggi/casino) - Play Poker, Blackjack, or Slots in the R console
* [worrrd](https://github.com/anthonypileggi/worrrd) - Generate wordsearch and crossword puzzles

## GitHub

* [skuvaultr](https://github.com/anthonypileggi/skuvaultr) - Interact with the [SkuVault](https://www.skuvault.com/) API (inventory management software)
* [channeladvisor](https://github.com/anthonypileggi/channeladvisor) - Interact with the [ChannelAdvisor](https://www.channeladvisor.com/) API (multi-channel commerce platform)
* [shipstationr](https://github.com/anthonypileggi/shipstationr) - Interact with the [ShipStation](https://www.shipstation.com/) API (shipping software)
